layer.name: Order
layer.definition: Reality has patterns that can be discovered and used.

questions.principle: Spiritual order exists and can be discovered

answers.5: deeply ordered — there are patterns waiting to be discovered
answers.2: possibly ordered, but I'm not sure
answers.3: ordered in some ways, chaotic in others
answers.1: random — there's no pattern or structure to it

questions.text: God's patterns and practices for knowing Him are ...

answers.4: generally clear — I recognize most of them
answers.5: established and discoverable — He's shown us how He works
answers.2: unclear — maybe there are some, but I can't identify them
answers.3: partially visible — I see some patterns but not consistently

questions.text: Evidence of divine order in Scripture, creation, and faithful lives is ...
questions.principle: Order is observable in spiritual reality

answers.4: generally visible — I see it in most places
answers.5: overwhelming — it's everywhere once you look

answers.4: they align with how spiritual growth generally works
answers.5: they align precisely with how God designed spiritual reality
answers.2: I'm not sure why — maybe coincidence
answers.3: something is happening, but I don't understand the connection
answers.1: they don't really work — results are random

questions.principle: Spiritual reality is objective, not arbitrary

answers.4: grounded in objective reality, though experienced personally
answers.5: rooted in ordered reality that can be known and shared
answers.2: mostly subjective with maybe some shared elements
answers.3: a mix of subjective and objective
answers.1: purely subjective — everyone's reality is different
